content: design by wingy winged row fb https //www facebook com/wingy arts instagram https //www instagram com/wingy_arts/ do not sell this design you may make this pattern for own use do not sell this shawl for own profit if it s for sharity contact me exceptions can be made please do share your creations with me i d love to see it tag me on insta or fb design has been tested so hopefully mistakes should be gone if there is a problem do poke me thank you yarn used hobbii twister as long as the yarn is 1000m crochet hook 4mm i crochet tightly use a 3 5 if you crochet loosely at row 9 it should be 14cm in width and 8 in height chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = triple/treble_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet v = 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet skip = skip st = stitch side notes in row 6 14 22 30 38 46 54 62 where you do the double_crochet s before the v space one double_crochet is in the single_crochet space of the chain end so don t get confused you won t end up short if you use that one too also in those row mentioned above if you chain 3 you skip over the 3 single_crochet s from the row below in to the next chain 5 space for row 7 15 23 31 39 47 55 and 63 you go from one fan stitch to another skipping over the chain 3 spaces /// chain 4 single_crochet in chain 1 row 1 5 double_crochet in loop hole chain 2 5 double_crochet row 2 chain 5 2 treble_crochet in 1st st chain 1 1 treble_crochet chain 1 x4 v in ch2 space chain 1 1tr chain 1 x4 2 treble_crochet ch1 1 treble_crochet in last st row 3 slip_stitch in chain space chain 4 2 double_crochet in chain space 8 double_crochet skip chain 1 stitches v in chain 2 space 8 double_crochet skip chain 1 stitches 2 double_crochet ch1 1 double_crochet in chain space row 4 slip_stitch in chain space chain 4 2 double_crochet chain space 12 bpdc v in chain 2 space 12 bpdc 2 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in chain space row 5 slip_stitch in chain space ch4 2 double_crochet in chain space single_crochet ch5 skip4 single_crochet ch3 skip 3 single_crochet ch5 sk4 single_crochet 1 double_crochet v in chain 2sp 1 double_crochet single_crochet chain 5 sk4 single_crochet ch3 skip 3 single_crochet ch5 skip 4 single_crochet 2dc ch1 1dc in chain space row 6 slip_stitch in chain space ch4 2 double_crochet chain space 2 double_crochet 8 double_crochet in chain 5 space chain 3 8 double_crochet in chain 5 space 4 double_crochet v ch2 space 4 double_crochet 8 double_crochet in ch5 space ch3 8 double_crochet in chain 5 space 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in chain space row 7 slip_stitch
